title: Spacious 4-Bed Family Retreat with Garden in Ustka’s Port District
description: Welcome to a bright and spacious apartment nestled in Ustka’s Port District. With four comfortable bedrooms and two modern bathrooms, this residence offers plenty of space for the whole family—as well as visiting guests. Wide patio doors flow effortlessly to the private garden, complemented by a sunny balcony, perfect for outdoor enjoyment. The open-plan living area is designed for convenience and togetherness, and the additional guest bathroom provides excellent flexibility for your household.
neighborhood_description: The Port District blends lively urban energy with the tranquility of a quieter neighborhood, ideal for family living. With bike lines weaving through the area and convenient highway access, getting in and out of Ustka is a breeze. The proximity to schools and everyday services ensures everything you need is only a short walk or ride away.
lifestyle_benefits: garden access for relaxation or remote work
balcony for fresh air and coffee breaks
close to schools for easy family routines
target_buyer: Ideal for remote-working families seeking a spacious, safe, and serene environment to grow and thrive, with easy access to both nature and town services.
market_positioning: A rare opportunity for families or professionals working remotely, this larger-than-average apartment offers flexible space and unique outdoor areas not often found in low-density Ustka neighborhoods, combining peaceful living with accessible city adventure.
